I felt like a Charlie Sheen in Platoon - I could observe two similar persons eaten by hate and violence (somehow similar to Sheen observing two sergeants). And like in the Platoon similar persons become totally different. One chose hate to the end for any cost\, even its own best friends and loved ones. The second... is changing on our eyes and chose redemption\, compassion and hope.Meanwhile I could also watch the war\, it's chaos and lies. At the end of the game I did what I could to not kill anymore if didn't need it\, as I understood that what I was thinking about enemies before was simply not true - both sides had their rights and both were run by lunatics. And because the game shows violence so strong\, I felt like I would really kill. And I felt these kills were bad.It was great adventure and great story.
